Verses: 1 kiristhu Yesuvinaal Undaayirukkira Jeevanaippatriya Vaakkuththaththaththinpadi, Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale, Yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaayirukkira Pavul,
2 piriyamulla Kumaaranaagiya Theemoththeyuvukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvinaalum Kirubaiyum Irakkamum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
3 naan Iravum Pagalum Idaividaamal En Jebangalil Unnai Ninaiththu, Un Kanneerai Gnaabagampanni, Sandhoshaththaal Niraiyappadumbadikku Unnaik Kaana Vaanjaiyaayirundhu,
4 unnilulla Maayamatra Visuvaasaththai Ninaivukoorugiradhinaal, En Munnorgal Mudharkondu Suththa Manachsaatchiyode Aaraadhiththuvarum Dhevanai Naan Sthoththirikkiren.
5 andha Visuvaasam Mundhi Un Paattiyaagiya Lovisaalukkullum Un Thaayaagiya Ainikkeyaalukkullum Nilaiththirundhadhu; Adhu Unakkullum Nilaiththirukkiradhendru Nichchayiththirukkiren.
6 idhinimiththamaaga, Naan Unmel En Kaigalai Vaiththadhinaal Unakku Undaana Dhevavaraththai Nee Analmootti Ezhuppividumpadi Unakku Ninaippoottugiren.
7 dhevan Namakkup Bayamulla Aaviyaik Kodaamal, Balamum Anbum Thelindha Puththiyumulla Aaviyaiye Koduththirukkiraar.

8 aagaiyaal Nammudaiya Karththaraippatriya Saatchiyaikkuriththaavadhu, Avarnimiththam Kattappattirukkira Ennaikkuriththaavadhu, Nee Vetkappadaamal, Dhevavallamaikketrapadi Suviseshaththirkaaga Ennodekoodath Theenganubavi.

9 avar Nammudaiya Kiriyaigalinpadi Nammai Ratchikkaamal, Thammudaiya Theermaanaththinpadiyum, Aadhikaalamudhal Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Namakku Arulappatta Kirubaiyinpadiyum, Nammai Ratchiththu, Parisuththa Azhaippinaale Azhaiththaar.

10 nammudaiya Ratchagaraagiya Yesukiristhu Pirasannamaanadhinaale Andhakkirubai Ippozhudhu Velippaduththappattadhu; Avar Maranaththaip Parigariththu, Jeevanaiyum Azhiyaamaiyaiyum Suviseshaththinaale Veliyarangamaakkinaar.
11 adharku Naan Pirasangiyaagavum, Apposthalanaagavum, Purajaadhiyaarukkup Podhaganaagavum Niyamikkappatten.

12 adhinimiththam Naan Indhap Paadugalaiyum Anubavikkiren; Aayinum, Naan Vetkappadugiradhillai; Enendraal, Naan Visuvaasiththirukkiravar Innaarendru Ariven, Naan Avaridaththil Oppukkoduththadhai Avar Annaal Varaikkum Kaaththukkolla Vallavaraayirukkiraarendru Nichchayiththumirukkiren.
13 nee Kiristhu Yesuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththodum Anbodum Ennidaththil Kettirukkira Aarokkiyamaana Vasanangalin Sattaththaik Kaikkondiru.
14 unnidaththil Oppuvikkappatta Andha Narporulai Namakkulle Vaasampannugira Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Kaaththukkol.
15 aasiyaa Naattilirukkira Yaavarum Avargalil Pigellu Ermogene Mudhalaai Ennaivittu Vilaginaargalendru Arindhirukkiraai.
16 onesipporuvin Veettaarukkuk Karththar Irakkang Kattalaiyiduvaaraaga; Avan Anegandharam Ennai Ilaippaatrinaan; En Vilangaikkuriththu Avan Vetkappadavumillai;
17 avan Romaavil Vandhirundhapodhu Adhiga Jaakkiradhaiyaai Ennaiththedik Kandupidiththaan.
18 annaalile Avan Karththaridaththil Irakkaththaik Kandadaiyumpadi, Karththar Avanukku Anukgiraganjeyvaaraaga; Avan Ebesuvile Seydha Parpala Udhavigalaiyum Nee Nandraai Arindhirukkiraaye.
